about_the_game:
Note: This DLC requires the More Colors DLC and The Cenozoic Era base game to play.

DLC Description: Pink/Purple Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era

Add a splash of vibrant color to your prehistoric world with the Pink/Purple Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era. This DLC introduces stunning pink and purple shades, perfect for creating unique colors that stand out with striking beauty.

Features:

  • Vivid Pink & Purple Tones: Enhance your world with a variety of pink and purple hues.

  • Bold, Unique Aesthetic: Create a striking and colorful environment, from lavender plains to deep magenta skies.

  • Customizable Visuals: Experiment with these bold colors to create an eye-catching, one-of-a-kind prehistoric world.

name: The Cenozoic Era - Pink/Purple Color Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The Pink/Purple Color Pack for The Cenozoic Era adds vibrant pink and purple tones to your world, Create a bold, colorful animal with these stunning hues.
